8 to the power of 4 colon 8 squared equals 8 to the power of 4 over 8 squared equals fraction numerator 8 straight x 8 straight x 8 straight x 8 over denominator 8 straight x 8 end fraction equals 8 straight x 8 equals 8 squared equals 8 to the power of 4 minus straight a with bar on top end exponent
